TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EndpointFilterDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function EndpointFilterDelegate(context As EndpointFilterInvocationContext) As ValueTask(Of Object)
type EndpointFilterDelegate = delegate of EndpointFilterInvocationContext -> ValueTask<obj>

Docs.param: The associated with the current request.
Docs.summary: A delegate that is applied as a filter on a route handler.
Docs.returns: A result of calling the handler and applying any modifications made by filters in the pipeline.
